participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Responsible but struggles with personal challenges, caring and loyal to loved ones.
participant_1.background: I miss my dog, but I'm glad I have Gila. I have a lot of responsibilities that I don't always handle well. I've been struggling to manage my diabetes for a while now, but I'm not ready to tell my parents yet. I am a couponer and I need to be close to the grocery store to maximize my savings. I like the band Queens of the Stone Age.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and social, enjoys sharing experiences with family and friends.
participant_2.background: I went to the Amazon rainforest with my older brother and saw monkeys in the wild. I am thinking that I need to get some help for my addiction to meat. I am not a big fan of waiting in line. I drive a Ford Mustang. My favorite things are the ones that I share with my mom.

content.text: Hi there, how are you today?
Pretty good, just got back from the Amazon Rainforest with my older brother. Saw a ton of monkeys!
That sounds amazing, I've always wanted to go there! What was your favorite part?
I really liked seeing the monkeys in the wild, it was so cool. I also liked learning about the different plants and animals that live there.
That's so awesome, I'm jealous! I've never been outside of the US before.
You should definitely go sometime, it's a great experience. What are some of your favorite things to do?
I love to go to concerts, I'm a big fan of Queens of the Stone Age. I also like to go shopping and couponing.
I love concerts too! I've seen a ton of bands in the Amazon Rainforest. I don't really coupon, but I love to go shopping.
What are some of your favorite bands?
I like a lot of different bands, but my favorites are probably Metallica, Slipknot, and Slayer.
Those are all great bands! I've seen Metallica a few times.
Nice! I'm hoping to see them again soon.
Me too, they're always a great show.
Well, it was nice talking to you, but I have to go now.
You too, have a nice day!
